messages.subject: Re: Takeaki Enomoto on NHK + Shinsengumi Music Video
messages.msgSnippet: ... Enomoto ... Hijikata in ... Suddenly, S P O I L E R S P A C E No, Taiga drama is ended by Kondou s execution. After Toba-Fushimi war, Enomoto and Kondou
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@h...>
wrote:
> According to a Shinsengumi club in Japan...the role of Takeaki
Enomoto
> for NHK has been cast...which means we will -probably- see
Hijikata in
> Hakodate


Suddenly,


S
P
O
I
L
E
R

S
P
A
C
E



No, Taiga drama is ended by Kondou's execution.
After Toba-Fushimi war, Enomoto and Kondou meet in the ship which
returns to Edo.
It is only this one scene that Enomoto appears.
The reason which has become the center of attention in Japan is that
the player who plays Enomoto is the member of the same group as
Katori (Kondou's player).
Katori is the member of "Smap" of a famous idol group of Japan.
Kusanagi Tsuyoshi which is the member of the same group plays
Enomoto.


From last year, it was known by people that a Taiga drama will
finish with Kondou's death.
Hino town was performing the signature-collecting campaign which
continues a drama to Hakodate.
(The sequel may be created depending on the case. However, the
possibility is low.)

momoiro-usagi

messages.subject: Takeaki Enomoto on NHK + Shinsengumi Music Video
messages.msgSnippet: According to a Shinsengumi club in Japan...the role of Takeaki Enomoto for NHK has been cast...which means we will -probably- see Hijikata in Hakodate
messages.messageBody:
According to a Shinsengumi club in Japan...the role of Takeaki Enomoto
for NHK has been cast...which means we will -probably- see Hijikata in
Hakodate

http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
you will see the video right away
password = makoto (use for all files)
in 20 days only selected files will be hosted by another member
[I will make an announcement at that time]

the very best files in my opinion are the academic articles (if you
wanted to search on your own you would have to be a member of
jstor.org and that costs $)...the SEinan War paintings, and the
scanned pages about swords with complete labelling of all the parts

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Never before seen pictures of Matsudaira and his sister
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think it s a common typo-- I ve seen it elsewhere. Also, http://members.at.infoseek.co.jp/sinsengumigenrouin/jinbutu/imgj/imgj02/y_yamaoka_saitou.jpg has
messages.messageBody:
>M, is it just a typo on the part of the person who named the file that he's
>shown as "Takamori" instead of "Katamori"? Amazing what a difference in
>style of attire and hair can do to a person.

I think it's a common typo-- I've seen it elsewhere.

Also,
http://members.at.infoseek.co.jp/sinsengumigenrouin/jinbutu/imgj/imgj02/y_yamaoka_saitou.jpg
has a picture of a Sekihoutai member, Saitou Nobuyuki.

I will also take this opportunity to announce that my Shinsengumi music
video is on Sec's streamload account...get it before it's gone!

--M.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Never before seen pictures of Matsudaira and his sister
messages.msgSnippet: M, is it just a typo on the part of the person who named the file that he s shown as Takamori instead of Katamori ?  Amazing what a difference in style of
messages.messageBody:
M, is it just a typo on the part of the person who named the file that he's shown as "Takamori" instead of "Katamori"? Amazing what a difference in style of attire and hair can do to a person.

phil

Hirotada Tokugawa <patriot014@...> wrote:
Post-Bakumatsu picture of Matsudaira Katamori...

http://members.at.infoseek.co.jp/sinsengumigenrouin/jinbutu/imgj/imgzzz/m_matudaira_takamori_02_1.jpg

Picture of his half-sister, Teru-hime, who fought in the Women's Brigade:

http://members.at.infoseek.co.jp/sinsengumigenrouin/jinbutu/imgj/imgj07/teruhime_1.jpg

Awesome what you find when you switch search criteria around a tad.....

--M.
